TopicTitle: PUMA light attack vehicle/all purpose rover! By Zokesia Skunkworks!

Articles.Content:
The PUMA.

Designed as a light attack vehicle, the PUMA has two small missiles, cockpit, and plenty of power. it's not the fastest but it does the job of recon well. The PUMA can be used for civil or millitary purposes, to make it nonweaponized just take the missiles off and you have a refueling probe at the front.

Action Group "1" toggles antennae. Press "G" to extend/retract the "machine gun" in the front.

Only 11 tons, so it is not hard to get to other celestial bodies for exploration or defending the perimeter of a base.

Chassis was built by brobel.

http://www./?0bq550p1e4d64t8
